Title: Christmas Waltz
Plot: Harry finds himself in an uncomfortable position after reconnecting with Paul Kinsey who has joined the Hare Krishnas. Lane takes drastic and unethical measures to get out of financial trouble. Don spends an afternoon with Joan to get her mind off her marital problems.
ParentalRatingReason: M Sex scenes,offensive language and drug use
GuestStars: Embeth Davidtz, Teyonah Parris, Ben Feldman, Anna Wood, Nicholas Guest, James DuMont, Mitchell Fink, Beth Hall, Sadie Alexandru, Stephanie Drake
